name: Jigsaw Puzzle Girls - Anime
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle Girls brings cute anime girls and traditional jigsaw puzzles to your computer.
Chose between 6 different puzzle sizes and 20 different hot pictures and start completing your own jigsaw anime waifu.
The game automatically saves each of your puzzle and makes it easy to navigate with zoom and movement options.
Two puzzle pieces that belong together connect automatically once put into the right place.

Features:

  • 19 different puzzles
  • 6 different puzzle sizes from 16 to 400 pieces per puzzle
  • Traditional puzzle gameplay
  • Peaceful puzzling atmosphere
  • Beautiful puzzle images
  • Auto saving, never lose your progress (saves every single puzzle)
  • Zoom option
  • Move around to easily keep track of your puzzle pieces
  • Achievements
